# Utku Ege Tuluk Portfolio

> Personal portfolio of Utku Ege Tuluk, a Research Engineer & AI Specialist based in Shanghai, China. Features AI-powered personalized layouts generated for different visitor types.

## About

Utku Ege Tuluk is a Research Engineer with 3+ years developing enterprise-scale educational technology platforms at NYU Shanghai. Expertise includes full-stack development, LLM integration, and production AI infrastructure.

## Contact

- Email: utkuegetuluk@gmail.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/uetuluk
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/uetuluk

## Featured Projects

- KIWI: Multimodal AI Learning Platform - enterprise-scale education system serving 300+ students
- ASK: Knowledge Base Chatbot Framework - multi-tenant RAG-based chatbot system
- VTuber Chat Helper: Cross-platform chat aggregator for livestreaming
- Spiegel 2D: AI VTuber Avatar application with real-time expressions

## Skills

Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQL, React, NestJS, Electron, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, Terraform, LangChain, RAG, Vector Databases, Real-time Processing
